name: The Managing of Chaos
description:
"…First automation started killing jobs…You could go for months without interacting with another human being, self-driving cars, courtroom juries were just a line of cameras that judged the accused through metrics. Then they started entering our homes, an iVacum here an iMaid there, the introduction of your home. Houses were fitted with a central automated management systems, who fed you, bathed you and dressed you Then they created systems that could think for you." ~TMOC

The Managing of Chaos is a linear visual novel, choice based game.

Follow Alexus Rider, the creator of the artificial intelligence; Solve Analyse, Modify. Which the fictional location of Angara City runs on. And what happens when AI goes rouge? Will the creator have to end its own creation, or be its eternal slave? That's up to you…
